about_the_game:
Send your heroes underground to find mana crystals and lost miners with the KR Crystal Cavern Tileset! Kokoro Reflections is here with a new cave tileset for MV that focuses on all that sparkles! Create caves filled with towering crystals, tunnels where gemstones are mined, and dungeons overflowing with crystalized plants and pathways. A1, A2, A4, and 2 B sheets are ready to build underground waterways and dirt paths that give way to crystal floors and walls.

This pack also includes 5 character sprites for treasure chests, levers, and canoes to add interesting puzzles and rewards to your caves! Pick up the KR Crystal Cavern Tileset and build multiple caves for your heroes to explore and gather unique crystals from each!

The crystal cave tileset includes (in 5 color choices):

Ground tiles:

* water tiles with various edges
* crystal ground tile (in two tones)
* other ground/dirt tiles in matching colors
* crystal grasses
* layerable dirt paths
* table
* crystal fence
* holes
* rocks
* tiny crystal path

Wall Tiles:

matching walls for most floor tiles – 6 total, with matching roof tiles

Also includes these:

* tons of crystals – some irregular crystal growths, some neat and symmetrical, in many sizes
* crystal plants – small plants, shrubs, flowers and larger bushes
* cliff tiles with crystal tops – includes natural bridges, cave entrance, and cliff tiles in water
* crystal mushrooms – multiple sizes, plus lots of tiny clusters.
* two fairy rings.
* submerged plants
* crystal wall supports
* walking planks
* two types of bridges, in horizontal and vertical
* ladder (with broken version)
* rope (with torn version)
* extra shadow tiles
* stairs
* stepping stones
* mine tiles – includes dynamite, mine carts, barrels, tools, train tracks, crates, etc
* and more!

Events and Animations

* sparkles in all five colors
* two lever animations
* treasure crate
* canoe (one with, one without oars)
